headline.main: Has the He-covery Become a She-covery?

docs.snippet: For nearly all of 2010 and 2011, job growth was stronger for men than for women. But in the last few months, the trend has turned around: since December, job growth has been significantly stronger for women than men....
docs.abstract: For nearly all of 2010 and 2011, job growth was stronger for men than for women. But in the last few months, the trend has turned around: since December, job growth has been significantly stronger for women than men.

docs.snippet: According to a survey of manufacturers and service companies, United States companies are reporting stronger order flows than those in most other countries, while Germany is no longer reporting strong numbers, and orders are weakening sharply in s...
docs.lead_paragraph: According to a survey of manufacturers and service companies, United States companies are reporting stronger order flows than those in most other countries, while Germany is no longer reporting strong numbers, and orders are weakening sharply in some other members of the euro zone.
